label.phrase: we wanted to eliminate the advantage microsoft has with the office monopoly and this eliminates that advantage for microsoft because now a user can choose to use alfresco as easily as they would choose to use sharepoint

clusterList.phrase: we wanted to eliminate the advantage microsoft has with the office monopoly and this eliminates that advantage for microsoft because now a user can choose to use alfresco as easily as they would choose to use sharepoint
you can now stand up an alfresco labs server next to a sharepoint server and office will not be able to tell the difference between the two
